name: domv
author: Joris van der Wel <joris@jorisvanderwel.com>
description: Create views as components using DOM. Run the same code on the browser and on the server.

scripts.test: istanbul cover ./node_modules/nodeunit/bin/nodeunit test/domv.js test/Component.js test/HtmlDocument.js && jshint lib/domv.js lib/Component.js lib/Exception.js lib/HtmlDocument.js lib/ClassList.js  test/domv.js test/Component.js test/HtmlDocument.js test/browser-test.js
scripts.posttest: echo Open test/browser-test.html to run the test suite in a web browser.
scripts.documentation: jsdoc -d ./jsdoc --pedantic --verbose lib/domv.js lib/Component.js lib/Exception.js lib/HtmlDocument.js && jsdoc2md --src lib/domv.js lib/Component.js lib/Exception.js lib/HtmlDocument.js > ./jsdoc/api.md
